product_name: NRS H2Core Silkweight Long-Sleeve Shirt - Men's
long_description: Designed for any active sport around water, the men's NRS H2Core(TM) Silkweight Long-Sleeve Shirt maximizes breathability and sun protection while enhancing the body's natural cooling process. Fabric wicks moisture away from the skin, breathes freely and dries quickly for cool comfort on the water; UPF 45 sun protection. Relaxed fit for casual comfort, and friction-free zones under the arms ensure comfortable paddling and rowing.
short_description: Designed for any active sport around water, the men's NRS H2Core(TM) Silkweight Long-Sleeve Shirt maximizes breathability and sun protection while enhancing the body's natural cooling process.
